battleStats:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
battleStats:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

battleStats:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
battleStats:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
battleStats:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

battleStats:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
battleStats:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

battleStats:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
battleStats:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !battleStats:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

battleStats:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
battleStats:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !battleStats:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
